mapper.select: SELECT sc.sl_number,sc.sl_school_name,sc.sl_outer_name,sc.sl_state,re.areaName,ad.as_name FROM zs_school sc,zs_region re,zs_address ad WHERE sc.sl_area_id=re.id AND ad.id=sc.sl_district_id
select dot.*,school.sl_school_name as scname from zs_dot dot,zs_school school where dot.dt_school_id=school.sl_number
